p: CTU level guidance in response to the COVID-19 crisis advocated halting new recruitment and continue to follow-ups in 7/18 units (39%). Eight CTUs (44%) indicated that the trial team (trial managers or chief investigators) should evaluate the risk-benefit of their trial with regards to continuing or halting recruitment.
